meanings.definition: The quality of being indubitable; certainty.
meanings.sent1: The indubitability of the sun rising every morning brings comfort and assurance.
meanings.sent2: There is an indubitability in the fact that water freezes at 0 degrees Celsius.
meanings.sent3: The indubitability of my cat stealing my socks never fails to amuse me.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an indubitability that lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The indubitability of his love for her was evident in every gesture.

meanings.definition: Something that is indubitable; undeniable fact.
meanings.sent1: The indubitability of gravity keeps us grounded on Earth.
meanings.sent2: It is an indubitability that the Earth revolves around the sun.
meanings.sent3: The indubitability of my dog's guilty face when caught eating my shoes always makes me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The indubitability of time's passage is like a relentless river flowing forward.
meanings.sent5: The indubitability of her talent shone through in every performance.
